name: National Database and Registration Authority (Amendment) Ordinance, 2006
tagline: To amend the National Database and Registration Authority Ordinance, 2000 for further purposes.

7r8 THE GAZETIE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., NOV I,2006 [Pmrl
Now, ruererone. in exercise of the powers conferred by clause (1) of
Article 89 olthe Constitution ofthe Islamic Republic ofPakistan, the President is
pleased to make and pronrulgate the following Ordinance :-
2. Amendment of section 30, Ordinance VIII of 2000.-ln the
National Database and Registration Authorlty Ordinance, 2000 (VIII of 2000),
hereinafter referred to as the said Ordinance, in section 30, in sub-section (2), for
the words "one year" the words "ten years" shall be substituted.
3. Amendment of section 31, Ordinance VIII of 2000.-ln the said
Ordinance, in section 31, the word "gazetted" shall be omitted.

l. Short title and commencement.-{ I ) This Ordinance may be called
the National Database and Registration Authority (Amendment) Ordinance, 2006.
(2) It shall come into force at once.
